about_the_game:
Only in French, sorry.

Why?


Because Hypnosia contains hypnotic sessions that can't just be translated, they need to be completely rewritten.

When?


It's not planned for now but, who knows...

About Hypnosia


Hypnosia is the first self-hypnosis aid application that allows you to use your voice to influence the course of the session.

Hypnosia builds the session as it goes along based on your responses, similar to a “choose your own adventure” book, with multiple possible session courses.

Download the demo: A first discovery session is offered with the theme “freeing the mind”, to relieve an overload of thoughts and focus on what's essential.

Integrated voice recognition allows you to better define what you wish to change, whether it's to stop smoking, sleep better, change a habit, manage stress, improve your self-confidence, lose weight, transform sensations, or positively project yourself.

To ensure maximum confidentiality, Hypnosia operates entirely offline, so you are free to say whatever you want and to make the most of your session.

Hypnosia is also available on Android and iOS smartphones!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit operating system required
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD integrated graphics or equivalent AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in standard
  • Additional Notes: Microphone required for voice recognition
